verses.1: Tu-in Paisan Pawi hun ding ni khat bek in sam a, Jesu in hih leitung nusia-in a Pa kiangah a pai ding hun a tunna thu a thei hi. Hih leitungah a om ama mite it mahmah ahih manin a hih theihna zah ciang tawh a itna a lak hi.
verses.2: Jesu le a nungzuite nitak an ne-in a tukhawm uh hi. Tua hun laitakin dawimangpa in Simon Iskariotʼ tapa Judasʼ lungsim sungah Jesu lehhek nading ngaihsutna koih khinzo hi.
verses.3: A Pa in ama khut sungah vangliatna khempeuh a piakna le Pasian in amah a sawl mah bangin tu-in Pasian kiangah a paikik ding ahihna thu zong a thei hi.
verses.4: Tua ahih manin a annekna sabuai panin Jesu ding khia-in a puan tungsilh suah khia a, a kawng ah a mainulpi a teeng hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin kuangpi sung khat ah tui sung a, a nungzuiteʼ khe silsakin a kawng ah a teen a mainulpi tawh a nul keusak dingin a kipan hi.
verses.6: Simon Peterʼ khe silsak dingin a kipat ciangin Peter in, “Topa aw, ka khe hong silsak zenzen ding na hi hiam?” a na ci hi.
verses.7: Jesu in, “Tu-a ka gamtatna thu na theih loh hangin nidang ciangin na thei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.8: Peter in, “Nang peuhmah ka khe ka hong silsak ngei buang kei ding hi,” a cih ciangin, “Na khe hong silsak kei leng, kei tawh na kipawl thei nawn kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, tua bang ahihleh ka khe bek hong silsak kei inla, ka khutte le ka lu zong hong silsak in,” a na ci leuleu hi.
verses.10: Jesu in, “A kipumsil khin sa mite siangtho ta ahih manin a khe sim loh silkik ding kisam nawn lo hi. Note sung panin khat sim loh na vekpi-un na siang khin uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.11: Jesu in amah a lehhek ding pa thei khin ahih manin, “Note sung panin khat sim loh na siang khin uh hi,” a ci ahi hi.
verses.12: Jesu in amauteʼ khe a silsak khit ciangin a puan silhkik a, annek sabuai ah a tutnasa mun hong zuanin, “Tu-a note tungah ka hong gamtatna thu na thei uh hiam?
verses.13: Note in kei pen Siapa le Topa, na hong ci uh hi. Na hong cih uh mah bangin a man ka hi hi.
verses.14: Noteʼ Topa le Siapa in na khe uh hong silsak ka hih leh note khatlekhat na kisilsak kan ding uh kilawm hi.
verses.15: Note tungah ka hong gamtat bangin note na gamtat theih nadingun a lim a hong lak ka hi hi.
verses.16: A mantakin ci lehang, sila pen a topa sangin lian zaw ngei lo a, a kisawl pa zong a sawl pa sangin lian zaw ngei lo hi.
verses.17: Hih thu thei-in na zuih uh leh na lung uh nuam mahmah ding hi.
verses.18: “Hih bangin ka hong genna in note khempeuh hong huam kim lo hi. Ka teel sa mite ka thei hi. Lai Siangtho in, ‘Ka an a ne pa in kei hong langpang hi,’ a cihna thu a tun ding kisam hi.
verses.19: Hih thu hong tun taktak ciangin, ‘Kei kua ka hihna,’ na hong theih nadingun a hun ma-in a hong ma gen ka hi hi.
verses.20: A mantakin ci lehang, keima hong sawl mite a sangte in kei zong a hong sang ahi uh a, kei a hong sangte in kei a hong sawl pa zong a sang ahi uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.21: Jesu in hih thu teng a gen khit ciangin lungkham mahmah ahih manin, “A mantakin ci lehang, note khat in kei nong lehhek ding uh hi,” ci-in a kilangin a gen khia hi.
verses.22: Kua a cihnopna hi ding ahi hiam, ci-in a nungzuite khatlekhat a ki-en uh hi.
verses.23: Jesu in a it diak a nungzuite khat ama kiangah tu ahih manin,
verses.24: Simon Peter in a mitheek tawh amah hopih a, “Kua a cihnopna ahi hiam?” dong in, ci-in a sawl hi.
verses.25: Tua ahih manin tua nungzui pa in zong Jesu neh phei lai deuhin, “Topa aw, kua ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi.
verses.26: Jesu in, “Anlum, meh sungah diahin ka piak ding pa ahi hi,” a cih khit ciangin a anlum diahin Simon Iskariotʼ tapa Judas a pia hi.
verses.27: Judas in tua an a nek khit phetin ama sungah Satan hong lut pah hi. Tua ahih manin Jesu in ama kiangah, “Na hih ding peuhpeuh hih pak in,” a ci hi.
verses.28: Ahi zongin sabuai ah a tut khawm pih mite in hih bangin a cihna thu thei lo uh hi.
verses.29: Amah sumkem ahih manin hih pawi a zat ding a kisam na pawl khat a lei dingin a sawl hi ding hi; tua ahih kei leh zong mizawngte pawl khat tungah sum a pia dingin a sawl hi ding hi, ci-in nungzui pawl khat in a ngaihsun uh hi.
verses.30: Tua hi a, Judas in a an a san khit ciangin a paikhia pah hi. Tua hunin khua mial khinta hi.
verses.31: Judas a paikhiat khit ciangin Jesu in, “Tu-in Mihing Tapa in Pasianʼ pianzia a neihna hong kilang ding hi ta hi; ama hangin Pasian in minthanna a ngah ding ahi hi.
verses.32: Ama hangin Pasian in minthanna a ngah mah bangin Pasian in zong ama pianzia amah ngahsak dinga, a sawt loin ngahsak pah ding hi.
verses.33: Ka tate aw, note tawh sauvei ka hong om khawm nawn kei ding hi. Note in kei na hong zong ding uh a, ahi zongin Jerusalem khua-a Jew uliante kiangah, ‘Ka paina munah na hong pai thei kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in ka gen mah bangin note kiangah zong tu-in kong gen hi.
verses.34: Note tungah ka hong piak thak thu in: Note khatlekhat na ki-it ding uh ahi hi. Note ka hong it mah bangin note khatlekhat na ki-it un.
verses.35: Note khatlekhat ki-it le-uhcin keima nungzuite na hihna uh mi khempeuh in hong thei ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.36: Tua ciangin Simon Peter in, “Topa aw, koi ah pai ding na hi hiam?” ci-in a dot ciangin Jesu in, “Ka paina dingah tu-in na hong zui thei nai kei ding hi; ahi zongin nidang ciangin na hong zui ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.37: Peter in, “Bang hangin tu-in hong zui thei lo ding ka hi hiam? Nang ka hong sihpih ding hi,” a cih ciangin
verses.38: Jesu in, “Kei hong sihpih ngam ding na hi hiam? A mantakin kong genin ah, kei thum veina hong nial khit matengin ak khuang lo ding hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
